name: My Hero One's Justice 2: Villainous Wear Set
summary: Players will be able to use Villainous Wear outfits for the following 9 characters: Tomura Shigaraki Before Style, Tomura Shigaraki, Dabi, Himiko Toga, Twice, Mr. Compress, Muscular, Kai Chisaki, and Kendo Rappa. This pack also includes 10 color variations for each outfit.
